Text: Scarlet Sister Mary:  "The Gaffney Ledger" newspaper, however, serially published the complete book.

<Text: Scarlet Sister Mary:  Dr. Richard S. Burton, the chairperson of Pulitzer's fiction-literature jury, recommended that the first prize go to the novel "Victim and Victor" by John Rathbone Oliver.]
